resources.string: The application is developed and maintained by Active Orbit Ltd - activeorbit.co.uk.
The application aims to improve mobility by offering you an insight into your daily travel.

The app sends any collected information to a database to be analysed, but this data is anonymised and cannot be linked to a particular individual. This information is used to assess the success of the app, to feed into future improvements and allow research into improving mobility.
Yes, the application encrypts data and uses secure storage to make sure that any data is protected.
Using the sensors in your phone, the application measures when you started moving. Using this data it will determine whether you are walking, cycling or in a motorised vehicle.

No, while the application will work without having the requested permissions, its functionality might be limited and inaccurate. We recommend granting all requested permissions for a more enjoyable and insightful experience.

The application will ask for a few permissions, such as:
Internet access: to send-us any issues you have observed.
Push notifications: to receive updates on mobility around your area.
Location services and activity tracking; to record how you are moving (walking, cycling, driving, etc), to calculate the calories you burnt.

In such an event we recommend that you check if there are any updates. Please always update the application to the latest version in order to get the best functionality. If that does not fix your issue please uninstall the application and install it again from your app store.\nYou can also contact through the Raise Issue button.
It is possible that your model has some very strict battery saving options and therefore you need to exclude this app from those.
How does the application track activity?
